snippet: Charlie Crist, who was elected governor of Florida as a Republican, then ran unsuccessfully for the United States Senate as an independent, announced the move via Twitter.
abstract: Former Florida Gov Charlie Crist, who was elected as a Republican before running  unsuccessfully for the United States Senate as an independent, announces he is switching to the Democratic Party; announcement sparks speculation he will run again for governor's seat in 2014.
lead_paragraph: Charlie Crist, who was elected governor of Florida as a Republican, then ran unsuccessfully for the United States Senate as an independent, announced the move via Twitter.

headline.seo: Charlie Crist, Former Florida Governor, Joins Democratic Party
headline.main: Changing Affiliation Again, Former Governor of Florida Becomes a Democrat
headline.print_headline: Changing Affiliation Again, Former Governor of Florida Becomes a Democrat
